overview:
Erik is a seasoned leader of early and growth stage technology companies.

Prior to co-founding Meritocruitment he was CEO of Snipp Interactive Inc., a mobile marketing solutions provider listed on the TSX-V. His earlier experience include serving as US co-head of Inzenka - an boutique innovation consultancy, COO of Lightbridge - an energy technology company, head of business development at Worldspace - a satellite communications company. Erik started his business career with the Boston Consulting Group in the US and Europe.
